name: SICK
short_description:
Sick IRC Client, Kid!, or SICK for short, is a small Unix and GNU/Linux IRC client running from the terminal, written in pure Python. The entire project is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 2.

WARNING: SICK is a WIP, don't expect the experience of a complete IRC client yet. We're working on it. Installation instructions can be found at https://github.com/Weloxux/sick/wiki/Installation

ANOTHER WARNING: SourceForge doesn't always get the latest updates on time, for some unknown reason. Get the latest version at https://github.com/Weloxux/sick/releases
summary: Unix and GNU/Linux terminal IRC client.
